errors.notVerified: Your username has not been verified. Please check your email to confirm your account.
errors.badCredentials: You entered an incorrect username or password.
errors.duplicatedUser: The email you entered is already in use. Do you already have an account? Try to recover the password

haveAccount: Do you already have an account?
forgetPasswordDescription: Please enter an email where we can send you a link with instructions to reset your password.
successSignUp: <alert>You have been successfully registered</alert>We have sent an email with verification instructions to <bold>{{email}}</bold>. Please check your email and follow the instructions.<brake></brake> If you haven't received an email from us within 15 minutes, please check your SPAM folder. If there is no email yet, click here to resend it.

confirmation.title: Account verify
confirmation.errorCheckSubtext: It can happen if you have clicked on the link that we have sent you after having correctly entered your account, the link has expired, or the URL is incorrect.
confirmation.errorUserNotFountOrVerified: The account does not exist or is already verified.

recovery.helpText: Please enter an email where we can send you a link with instructions to reset your password.
recovery.sentSubtext: If <bold>{{email}}</bold> is associated with an existing account, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.<brake></brake> If you haven't received an email from us within 15 minutes, please check your SPAM folder. If there is still no email, click here to try again.
